faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about the AI Headshot Generator

items.title: What styles of headshots can I generate?
items.description: You can generate a wide variety of headshot styles, including corporate, casual, artistic, and more. Just specify your desired look in the prompt.

items.title: Is it free to use the headshot generator?
items.description: Yes! Each user gets 30 free credits daily, allowing you to create multiple headshots. Additional credits can be earned through activities on our platform.

items.title: Can I use my generated headshots for professional purposes?
items.description: Yes, headshots created with any subscription plan can be used commercially. Free-tier users may use them for personal purposes only.

items.title: How is my privacy protected?
items.description: All headshots are generated locally in your browser, ensuring your images and data remain private and secure.

footer.heading: Ready to Create Your Perfect Headshot?
footer.description: Try the AI Headshot Generator today and elevate your image. No sign-up required.
